    About
  • While at Autodesk, I worked on the integration of Dynamo, a visual programming environment, into Alias. This workflow improvement empowered designers to leverage scripting to create complex surfaces that would be otherwise too time-consuming to model.
  • My role was to make sure that Dynamo was relatively well integrated into Alias, and that the user experience was not too cumbersome.
